title: Collateral eSports LF Melbourne based Support
body:
PLEASE NOTE BEFORE READING, IF YOU ARE UNABLE TO ATTEND MELBOURNE BASED LAN'S THIS ISN'T FOR YOU

Hello ,Collateral eSports are currently looking for a LAN based Support.

The current line up is as follows

Top - Gnar im not
JG - Icing
Mid - The Real Cletus
AD - Pinch from the 6

- Requirements -

Good Attitude This includes Minimum to no BM (Bad Manners) during both Online and Offline games. As well as keeping a high morale during games. and ZERO rage.

Communication  is vital in a team environment so we prefer you to be VERY vocal. Must also be able to download and use TeamsSpeak3

Age We require you to be atleast 17 years of age as that's the minimum age required to play in official Riot Tournaments.


- Template -


IGN:
AGE:
LOCATION:
CHAMP POOL:
STRENGTHS:
WEAKNESS:
OTHER INFO:



Reply either below, Via PM or add Pinch from the 6 in game 

Cheers for reading.

replies.body:
Ooh this looks like it might be good. 

IGN: bapitixo
AGE: 23
LOCATION: Northern Melbourne (suburbs)
CHAMP POOL: Supports: Thresh, Blitz, Leona, Nami, Morgana, Sona, Zyra, Braum (from best to... not so best)
STRENGTHS: Good Communicator, Solid mechanics, Always aware and alert
WEAKNESS: Lack of team play (due to not finding anyone of a "good fit"), hesitant to trust new partners for initiates (if not synergematic (its a new word :P))
OTHER INFO: Previously Dia 2 support before my account got hacked and had the email changed, available most of the day to play games, Have skype and microphone available
